content.en: Matrix equation algorithms: Algorithms play a crucial role in solving various types of matrix equations. Researchers have developed iterative algorithms to find solutions for coupled Sylvester matrix equations, generalized coupled Sylvester matrix equations, and coupled Sylvester-conjugate matrix equations. These algorithms are used to derive iterative solutions, construct iterative methods, and establish efficient gradient-iterative algorithms for solving these equations. Additionally, matrix algorithms have been developed to solve generalized coupled Sylvester and periodic coupled matrix equations using extended bi-conjugate gradients and bi-conjugate residual methods.
content.da: Matrix ligningsalgoritmer: Algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i løsning af forskellige typer matrixligninger. Forskere har udviklet iterative algoritmer til at finde løsninger på koblede Sylvester matrixligninger, generaliserede koblede Sylvester matrixligninger og koblede Sylvester-konjugerede matrixligninger. Disse algoritmer bruges til at udlede iterative løsninger, konstruere iterative metoder og etablere effektive gradient-iterative algoritmer til løsning af disse ligninger. Derudover er der udviklet matrixalgoritmer til at løse generaliserede koblede Sylvester og periodiske koblede matrixligninger ved anvendelse af udvidede bi-konjugerede gradienter og bi-konjugerede residualmetoder.
